trends.title: Robotics software maker Skild AI hits $14B valuation
trends.summary: Skild AI, which is building general-purpose robotic software, just raised a $1.4 billion funding round led by SoftBank.

trends.title: The multibillion-dollar AI security problem enterprises can’t ignore
trends.summary: AI agents are supposed to make work easier. But they’re also creating a whole new category of security nightmares.  As companies deploy AI-powered chatbots, agents, and copilots across their operations, they’re facing a new risk: How do you let employees and AI agents use powerful AI tools without accidentally leaking sensitive data, violating compliance rules, or opening […]

trends.title: AI models are starting to crack high-level math problems
trends.summary: Since the release of GPT 5.2, AI tools have become inescapable in high-level mathematics.

trends.title: Gemini’s new beta feature provides proactive responses based on your photos, emails, and more
trends.summary: Personal Intelligence is off by default, as users have the option to choose if and when they want to connect their Google apps to Gemini.

trends.title: AI security firm, depthfirst, announces $40 million Series A
trends.summary: The company used an AI-native platform to help companies fight threats.

trends.title: A consumer watchdog issued a warning about Google’s AI agent shopping protocol — Google says she’s wrong
trends.summary: A consumer economics watchdog says Google's new Universal Commerce Protocol is ripe for misuse where consumers could pay more for items. Google denies this.

trends.title: Ring founder details the camera company’s ‘intelligent assistant’ era
trends.summary: AI is ushering in Ring’s next chapter, as the Amazon-owned video doorbell maker shifts toward becoming an “intelligent assistant.”

trends.title: Generative AI tool helps 3D print personal items that sustain daily use
trends.summary: “MechStyle” allows users to personalize 3D models, while ensuring they’re physically viable after fabrication, producing unique personal items and assistive technology.

trends.title: 3 Questions: How AI could optimize the power grid
trends.summary: While the growing energy demands of AI are worrying, some techniques can also help make power grids cleaner and more efficient.

trends.title: MIT scientists investigate memorization risk in the age of clinical AI
trends.summary: New research demonstrates how AI models can be tested to ensure they don’t cause harm by revealing anonymized patient health data.

trends.title: Guided learning lets “untrainable” neural networks realize their potential
trends.summary: CSAIL researchers find even “untrainable” neural nets can learn effectively when guided by another network’s built-in biases using their guidance method.

trends.title: Google’s Trends Explore page gets new Gemini capabilities
trends.summary: The Trends Explore page for users to analyze search interest just got a major upgrade. It now uses Gemini to identify and compare relevant trends.

trends.title: VoiceRun nabs $5.5M to build a voice agent factory
trends.summary: VoiceRun, a startup that creates voice agents, raised $5.5 million in a round led by Flybridge.

trends.title: Microsoft announces glut of new data centers but says it won’t let your electricity bill go up
trends.summary: The tech giant has pledged to be a "good neighbor" as it continues to invest in AI infrastructure throughout the country.

trends.title: At MIT, a continued commitment to understanding intelligence
trends.summary: With support from the Siegel Family Endowment, the newly renamed MIT Siegel Family Quest for Intelligence investigates how brains produce intelligence and how it can be replicated to solve problems.

trends.title: Decoding the Arctic to predict winter weather
trends.summary: With the help of AI, MIT Research Scientist Judah Cohen is reshaping subseasonal forecasting, with the goal of extending the lead time for predicting impactful weather.

trends.title: Stone Center on Inequality and Shaping the Future of Work Launches at MIT
trends.summary: Recent launch event for the center featured discussions on pro-worker AI, wealth inequality, and the future of liberal democracy.

trends.title: Using design to interpret the past and envision the future
trends.summary: MIT graduate student C Jacob Payne reimagines historic architecture and invents new possibilities at the intersection of AI and design.

trends.title: MIT in the media: 2025 in review
trends.summary: MIT community members made headlines with key research advances and their efforts to tackle pressing challenges.

trends.title: A new way to increase the capabilities of large language models
trends.summary: MIT-IBM Watson AI Lab researchers developed an expressive architecture that provides better state tracking and sequential reasoning in LLMs over long texts.
